@notice Define stacking contract address
 @param contractAddr the contract address referring to stacking.sol

@notice Define proxy contract address
 @param contractAddr the contract address referring to ProxySimple.sol

addLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uin.details: outputs minimum amounts are required as parameter, it reverts if the swap give an output below amountTokenAMin or amountTokenBMin

params.tokenA: , tokenB, amountTokenADesired, amountTokenBDesired, amountTokenAMin, amountTokenBMin, deadline return amountA, amountB added in liquidity & liquidity tokens received by stacking contract

approveERC20Uni(address,uint256).details: function restricted to the owner of the contract

returns._0: amountIn the approved amount for uniswap Router

approveProxy(address,uint256).details: use of a delegate call to pass the stacking address as argument for approve function

params.amount: the ERC20 token amount to approve for the stacking contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeLiquidity(address,address,uint256,.details: liquidity tokens amount & outputs minimum amounts are required as parameter, it reverts if the swap give an output below amountAMin or amountBMin

params.tokenA: , tokenB, amountTokenADesired, amountTokenBDesired, amountTokenAMin, amountTokenBMin, deadline

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.contractAddr: the contract address referring to ProxySimple.sol
the contract address referring to stacking.sol

swapTokens(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: an output minimum amount is required as parameter, it reverts if the swap give an output below amountOutMin

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: add ERC20 tokens in liquidity pools

approveERC20Uni(address,uint256).notice: approve an ERC20 token amount to uniswap Router

approveProxy(address,uint256).notice: allow the user to send ERC20 to the stacking contract

getBalance(address).notice: fetch an ERC20 balance of the stacking contract

removeLiquidity(address,address,uint256,.notice: remove ERC20 tokens from liquidity pools

swapTokens(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: swap ERC20 tokens with an exact input to a desired ouput

transferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer an ERC20 token to the stacking contract
